basics.name: Chandan Baluja
basics.label: Marketing & Sales Analyst
basics.summary: A result oriented Marketing & Sales Analyst with 10 years of industry experience in the Staffing, Internet / ecommerce / Dotcom, Media / Publishing domain with expertise in Business process improvement, Business Process Flow Documentation & Data Analysis.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: A Healthcare referral services company (national provider of staffing solutions in behavioral, social service, education, psychiatry, mental health and addictions treatment fields).
highlights: Reports and collaborates directly with the President
Manage vendors to maintain and grow strong relationships
Documented and reviewed SOPs, work plans, and other deliverables to gauge project performance and client satisfaction.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Lead Generation, New Business Development & growth of business agreements for physician recruitment solutions.
highlights: Managing the entire process, from sale to execution
Renew existing business, increase spend and create new buyers in existing accounts
Utilization of Salesforce for all outreach activity.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Handling Key Customer - Identify & analyze the client's requirements & propose customized solutions.
highlights: Business Development B2B outside & inside Sales
Won Sales Incentive International Trip - Hong Kong.

education.institution: Fore School of Management in collaboration with Nottingham Business School, UK
